name: Woo PayMaya Payment Gateway
author: Ryan IT Solutions

sections.description:
WooCommerce PayMaya Payment Gateway Plugin Vault – Tokenization & Card Vault Gateway Extension.
This extension allows you to accept Credit Cards Payments and Pay via Saved Cards.

Supported Currency

  • Currently, supported currency is Philippine Peso (PHP).

Features

  • Secure, Fast and Reliable Checkout Process.
  • Payment Tokenization
  • 3D Secure Supported
  • Refund

Demo Payment Checkout

  • Test plugin demo checkout

Online Docs

  • How to Setup WooCommerce PayMaya Payment Gateway
  • Watch demo how to set up WooCommerce PayMaya Payment Gateway Plugin
  • Watch Demo PayMaya WooCommerce Demo Checkout

GitHub

  • WooCommerce PayMaya Payment Gateway Plugin Source Code
  • WooCommerce PayMaya Payment Gateway Plugin Git Releases

Testing

Test this PayMaya woocommerce plugin by creating transactions using test cards and API keys available here. You can also contact PayMaya and request for your own set of API keys.

Promotion to Production

Once you have fully tested this PayMaya woocommerce plugin, you can contact PayMaya for assistance on your production deployment. Your integration will undergo a certification process. Once certified, you will be given a new set of API keys provisioned in production which you can use to process live payments.

Minimum Requirements

  • WooCommerce 3.7+
  • WordPress 5.2+
  • PHP 5+
  • PHP 7+
sections.installation: How to Setup WooCommerce PayMaya Payment Gateway

short_description: This extension allows you to accept payments in WooCommerce via PayMaya.
